description:
Luffy struggles to break himself free as Sanji falls deeper in love with the idea of marrying Pudding... But the mask falls off and the deadly charade of Big Mom is revealed as the depths of her treachery come to light!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cigarette humide. La nuit avant la mariage de Sanji
Eine nasse Zigarette! – Die Nacht vor Sanjis Hochzeit!
Moist Cigarette! The Night Before Sanji`s Wedding!
Промокшая сигарета! Ночь перед свадьбой Санджи!
シケモク サンジの結婚前夜
